lines.gurmukhi: <> siqgur pRswid ]

Dr. Jodh Singh.translation: One Oankar, the primal energy, realized through the grace of divine preceptor.

lines.gurmukhi: rwmklI vwr sRI BgauqI jI kI pwiqswhI dsvIN kI [

Dr. Jodh Singh.translation: Raag Ramkali, Vaar In praise of Sri Bhagauti Ji (The Sword) and the Tenth Master

lines.gurmukhi: bolxw BweI gurdws kw [
hir scy qKq rcwieAw; siq sMgiq mylw [

Dr. Jodh Singh.translation: God established the true congregation as his celestial throne.

lines.gurmukhi: nwnk inrBau inrMkwr; ivic isDW Kylw [

Dr. Jodh Singh.translation: (Guru) Nanak illuminated the Sidhas with the true form of the Fearless and Formless One.

lines.gurmukhi: guru ismr mnweI kwlkw; KMfy kI vylw [

Dr. Jodh Singh.translation: The Guru (in his Tenth Form) entreated the Shakti, the Integrity, by bequeathing the nectar through the Double-Edged Sword.

lines.gurmukhi: pIvhu pwhul KMfyDwr; hoie jnm suhylw [

Dr. Jodh Singh.translation: Quaffing the nectar of Double-Edged Sword, accomplish the worth of your birth.

lines.gurmukhi: gur sMgiq kInI ^wlsw; mnmuKI duhylw [

Dr. Jodh Singh.translation: While the egocentric remains in duality, the Khalsa, the pure ones, enjoy the association of the Guru;

lines.gurmukhi: vwh vwh goibMd isMG; Awpy guru cylw [1[

Dr. Jodh Singh.translation: Hail, hail (Guru) Gobind Singh; He, Himself, is the Master and Disciple too.

lines.gurmukhi: scw Amr goibMd kw; sux gurU ipAwry [

Dr. Jodh Singh.translation: O the beloved of the Guru, listen to the Eternal and True (Message of Guru) Gobind Singh.

lines.gurmukhi: siq sMgiq mylwp kir; pMc dUq sMGwry [

Dr. Jodh Singh.translation: When one joins the True Assembly, the five vices are liquidated.

lines.gurmukhi: ivic sMgiq FoeI nw lihin; jo Ksmu ivswry [

Dr. Jodh Singh.translation: In the Congregation no respect is accorded to the ones who disregard their Spouses,

lines.gurmukhi: gurisKW mQy aujly; scy drbwry [

Dr. Jodh Singh.translation: But the Guru's Sikh remains unblemished in the Court of Righteousness.

lines.gurmukhi: hir guru goibMd iDAweIAY; sd AMimRq vylw [

Dr. Jodh Singh.translation: And sequentially, always, meditate on Godly Guru Gobind Singh in the ambrosial hour.

lines.gurmukhi: vwh vwh goibMd isMG; Awpy guru cylw [2[

Dr. Jodh Singh.translation: Hail, hail (Guru) Gobind Singh; He, Himself, is the Master and the Disciple too.

lines.gurmukhi: hukmY AMdir vrqdI; ieh isRsit sbweI [

Dr. Jodh Singh.translation: Egoism pervades the affairs of the whole Universe.

lines.gurmukhi: ieik Awpy gurmuiK kIqIAnu; ijin hukm mnweI [

Dr. Jodh Singh.translation: Those are the only Gurmukhs (the ones adopting the Guru's way), who bow to the celestial order.

lines.gurmukhi: ieik Awpy Brm BulwieAnu; dUjY icqu lweI [

Dr. Jodh Singh.translation: But the rest, forgetting why they came, are drowned in falsehood and duality.

lines.gurmukhi: ieknw no nwmu bKisAnu; hoie Awip shweI [

Dr. Jodh Singh.translation: Those, who have the blessing of God's Name, have His own support.

lines.gurmukhi: gurmuiK jnmu skwrQw; mnmuKI duhylw [

Dr. Jodh Singh.translation: The Gurmukh enjoys the worth of his birth right whereas the egocentric remains in duality.

lines.gurmukhi: vwh vwh goibMd isMG; Awpy guru cylw [3[

Dr. Jodh Singh.translation: Hail, hail (Guru) Gobind Singh; He, Himself, is the Master and the Disciple too.

lines.gurmukhi: gurbwxI iqin BweIAw; ijin msqik Bwg [

Dr. Jodh Singh.translation: The Celestial Word is for them, whose divine writ is blessed.

lines.gurmukhi: mnmuiK CutiV kwmxI; gurmuiK sohwg [

Dr. Jodh Singh.translation: The egocentric is like a derelict woman but the fortunate is the Gurmukh one.

lines.gurmukhi: gurmuiK aUjl hMsu hY; mnmuK hY kwg [

Dr. Jodh Singh.translation: The Gurmukh is the epitome of a (white) swan whereas the (black) crow represents an egocentric.

lines.gurmukhi: mnmuiK aUNDy kvlu hY; gurmuiK so jwg [

Dr. Jodh Singh.translation: The egocentric resembles the withered lotus but the Gurmukh is full bloom.

lines.gurmukhi: mnmuiK join BvweIAin; gurmuiK hir mylw [

Dr. Jodh Singh.translation: Whereas the dissenter remains in transmigration, the Gurmukh is assimilated in Har.

lines.gurmukhi: vwh vwh goibMd isMG; Awpy gur cylw [4[

Dr. Jodh Singh.translation: Hail, hail (Guru) Gobind Singh; He, Himself, is the Master and the Disciple too.

lines.gurmukhi: scw swihbu Amr scu; scI guru bwxI [

Dr. Jodh Singh.translation: True is the Lord and True HisGurbani, the Celestial Word.

lines.gurmukhi: scy syqI riqAw; suK drgh mwxI [

Dr. Jodh Singh.translation: Infused in the True, celestial delight is gained.

lines.gurmukhi: ijin siqguru scu iDAwieAw; iqin suK ivhwxI [

Dr. Jodh Singh.translation: They who endeavour for the True recognition, relish the bliss.

lines.gurmukhi: mnmuiK drgh mwrIAY; iql pIVY GwxI [

Dr. Jodh Singh.translation: The egocentric are condemned to the hell, and their bodies are crushed by the oil-press.

lines.gurmukhi: gurmuiK jnm sdw suKI; mnmuKI duhylw [

Dr. Jodh Singh.translation: The Gurmukh's birth brings contentment while the egotistic wander in duality.

lines.gurmukhi: vwh vwh goibMd isMG; Awpy guru cylw [5[

Dr. Jodh Singh.translation: Hail, hail (Guru) Gobind Singh; He, Himself, is the Master and the Disciple too.

lines.gurmukhi: scw nwmu Amol hY; vfBwgI suxIAY [

Dr. Jodh Singh.translation: True Naam, the Word, is precious, and is grasped only by the fortunate ones,

lines.gurmukhi: siqsMgiq ivic pweIAY; inq hir gux guxIAY [

Dr. Jodh Singh.translation: In the True Assembly by, always, singing the praises of Har.

lines.gurmukhi: Drm Kyq kiljug srIr; boeIAY so luxIAY [

Dr. Jodh Singh.translation: In the field of righteousness in the Kal-age, one crops what one sows.

lines.gurmukhi: scw swihb scu inAwie; pwxI ijauN puxIAY [

Dr. Jodh Singh.translation: The True Lord, like straining water, assesses Truth through Justice.

lines.gurmukhi: ivic sMgiq scu vrqdw; inq nyhu nvylw [

Dr. Jodh Singh.translation: Truth prevails in the congregation, and unique is His everlasting affinity.

lines.gurmukhi: vwh vwh goibMd isMG; Awpy guru cylw [6[

Dr. Jodh Singh.translation: Hail, hail (Guru) Gobind Singh; himself is the Master and the Disciple too.

lines.gurmukhi: EAMkwr Akwr Awip; hY hosI AwpY [

Dr. Jodh Singh.translation: Har, the One and Only God is prevailing now and shall be.

lines.gurmukhi: EhI aupwvnhwru hY; gur sbdI jwpY [

Dr. Jodh Singh.translation: He, Himself, is the Creator, and is savoured through the Guru's Word.

lines.gurmukhi: iKn mih Fwih auswrdw; iqsu Bau n ibAwpY [

Dr. Jodh Singh.translation: Without any veneration, He produces as well as decimates in an instant.

lines.gurmukhi: klI kwl guru syvIAY; nhIN duK sMqwpY [

Dr. Jodh Singh.translation: In the Kal-age, by administering service to the Guru, the distress troubles not.

lines.gurmukhi: sB jgu qyrw Kylu hY; qUM guxI ghylw [

Dr. Jodh Singh.translation: Whole Universe is your presentation, and You are the ocean of benevolence.

lines.gurmukhi: vwh vwh goibMd isMG; Awpy guru cylw [7[

Dr. Jodh Singh.translation: Hail, hail (Guru) Gobind Singh; He, Himself, is the Master and the Disciple too.

lines.gurmukhi: Awid purK AnBY AnMq; guru AMq n pweIAY [

Dr. Jodh Singh.translation: The Primal Being is the an absolute perception, and without Guru His goals are unapproachable.

lines.gurmukhi: Apr Apwr AgMm Awid; ijsu liKAw n jweIAY [

Dr. Jodh Singh.translation: He, the infinite Primal Being, is not discernible through temporal aptitude.

lines.gurmukhi: Amr AjwcI siq nwmu; iqsu sdw iDAweIAY [

Dr. Jodh Singh.translation: He neither perishes nor needs any favours, and, therefore, must always be remembered,

lines.gurmukhi: scw swihb syvIAY; mn icMidAw pweIAY [

Dr. Jodh Singh.translation: As with service to the True One, the fear free posture is earned.

lines.gurmukhi: Aink rUp Dir pRgitAw; hY eyk Akylw [

Dr. Jodh Singh.translation: He, the only one, has manifested in myriad of forms.

lines.gurmukhi: vwh vwh goibMd isMG; Awpy guru cylw [8[

Dr. Jodh Singh.translation: Hail, hail (Guru) Gobind Singh; He, Himself, is the Master and the Disciple too.

lines.gurmukhi: AibnwsI Anµq hY; Git Git idstwieAw [

Dr. Jodh Singh.translation: The Indestructible Infinite-being is apparent in all the fragments.

lines.gurmukhi: AG nwsI Awqm ABul; nhIN BulY BulwieAw [

Dr. Jodh Singh.translation: The vices, He obliterates, and the oblivious one can forget Him not.

lines.gurmukhi: hir AlK Akwl Afol hY; guru sbid lKwieAw [

Dr. Jodh Singh.translation: Har, the all knowing Timeless, is unperturbable but can be experienced through the Guru's Word.

lines.gurmukhi: srb ibAwpI hY Alyp; ijsu lgY n mwieAw [

Dr. Jodh Singh.translation: He is omnipresent but non-aligned, and the illusion attracts Him not.

lines.gurmukhi: hir gurmuiK nwm iDAweIAY; ijqu lMGY vhylw [

Dr. Jodh Singh.translation: The Gurmukh converges on the Naam and conveniently swims across the mundane sea.

lines.gurmukhi: vwh vwh goibMd isMG; Awpy gur cylw [9[

Dr. Jodh Singh.translation: Hail, hail (Guru) Gobind Singh; He, Himself, is the Master and the Disciple too.

lines.gurmukhi: inrMkwr nrhir inDwn; inrvYru iDAweIAY [

Dr. Jodh Singh.translation: Recognise the Formless, the One with compassion for humanity, who is the treasure of benevolence, and sans enmity.

lines.gurmukhi: nwrwiex inrbwx nwQ; mn Anidn gweIAY [

Dr. Jodh Singh.translation: Day and night with diligent mind sing the praises of emancipating Lord.

lines.gurmukhi: nrk invwrx duK dlx; jip nrik n jweIAY [

Dr. Jodh Singh.translation: To escape the hell, recollect the One who prevents the hell and wipes out the torments,

lines.gurmukhi: dyxhwr dieAwl nwQ; jo dyie su pweIAY [

Dr. Jodh Singh.translation: As with service to the True One, the fear free pasture is earned.

lines.gurmukhi: duK BMjn suK hir iDAwn; mwieAw ivic Kylw [

Dr. Jodh Singh.translation: He, the only one, has manifested in myriad of forms.

lines.gurmukhi: vwh vwh goibMd isMG; Awpy guru cylw [10[

Dr. Jodh Singh.translation: Hail, hail (Guru) Gobind Singh; He, Himself, is the Master and the Disciple too.

lines.gurmukhi: pwrbRhm pUrn purK; prmysur dwqw [

Dr. Jodh Singh.translation: God Almighty is the Immaculate and Supreme Being.

lines.gurmukhi: piqq pwvn prmwqmw; srb AMqir jwqw [

Dr. Jodh Singh.translation: Knowing all, He is the saviour of fallen ones.

lines.gurmukhi: hir dwnw bInw bysumwr; byAMq ibDwqw [

Dr. Jodh Singh.translation: Beholding all, He is prudent and bountiful in charity.

lines.gurmukhi: bnvwrI bKisMd Awpu; Awpy ipq mwqw [
ieh mwns jnm Amol hY; imlny kI vylw [

Dr. Jodh Singh.translation: In valuable human form, it is the time to join with Him.

lines.gurmukhi: vwh vwh goibMd isMG; Awpy guru cylw [11[

Dr. Jodh Singh.translation: Hail, hail (Guru) Gobind Singh; He, Himself, is the Master and the Disciple too.

lines.gurmukhi: BY BMjn Bgvwn Bjo; BY nwsn BogI [

Dr. Jodh Singh.translation: Remember the destroyer of anxiety, and worship the obliterator of licentiousness.

lines.gurmukhi: Bgiq vCl BY BMjno; jip sdw ArogI [

Dr. Jodh Singh.translation: The Cherisher of His Devotees, destroys their afflictions, and makes them, the ones in meditation, for ever diseaseless.

lines.gurmukhi: mnmohn mUriq mukMd; pRBu jog su jogI [

Dr. Jodh Singh.translation: His alluring demeanour grants emancipation and chances amalgamation (with God).

lines.gurmukhi: rsIAw rKvwlw rcnhwr; jo kry su hogI [

Dr. Jodh Singh.translation: He, Himself is the Admirer, the Protector, and the Creator, and He proceeds the way He wishes.

lines.gurmukhi: mDusUdn mwDo murwir; bhu rMgI Kylw [

Dr. Jodh Singh.translation: God, the liberator of the destiny, is the adversary of ego and duality, and luxuriates in multitudes of plays.

lines.gurmukhi: vwh vwh goibMd isMG; Awpy guru cylw [12[

Dr. Jodh Singh.translation: Hail, hail (Guru) Gobind Singh; He, Himself, is the Master and the Disciple too.

lines.gurmukhi: locw pUrn ilKnhwru; hY lyK ilKwrI [

Dr. Jodh Singh.translation: (He) is realiser of desires, and is the destinies scribe.

lines.gurmukhi: hir lwln lwl gulwl scu; scw vwpwrI [

Dr. Jodh Singh.translation: Har is coloured with the dye of his devotees love, and being True He deals in the Truth.

lines.gurmukhi: rwvnhwru rhImu rwm; Awpy nr nwrI [

Dr. Jodh Singh.translation: Worthy of meditation, He is Kind, and is equally integrated in males and females.

lines.gurmukhi: irKIkys rGunwQ rwie; jpIAY bnvwrI [

Dr. Jodh Singh.translation: Deliberate on Rikhikesh, the conserver of perceptual organs and His manifestation in Raghunath (Sri Ram Chandra) and meditate on Banwari (The Lord Krishna).

lines.gurmukhi: prmhMs BY qRws nws; jip irdY suhylw [

Dr. Jodh Singh.translation: Har, the Supreme Soul, destroys fear; meditate and pacify the mind.

lines.gurmukhi: vwh vwh goibMd isMG; Awpy guru cylw [13[

Dr. Jodh Singh.translation: Hail, hail (Guru) Gobind Singh; He, Himself, is the Master and the Disciple too.

lines.gurmukhi: pRwn mIq prmwqmw; purKoqm pUrw [

Dr. Jodh Singh.translation: The life patron of Puranas, is the perfect Supreme Soul.

lines.gurmukhi: poKnhwrw pwiqswh hY; pRiqpwln aUrw [

Dr. Jodh Singh.translation: Har, the Sustaining Lord, is not deficient in protection.

lines.gurmukhi: piqq auDwrn pRwnpiq; sd sdw hjUrw [

Dr. Jodh Singh.translation: Hail! Manifested is the Supreme Being in the countenance of gallant Guru Gobind Singh,

lines.gurmukhi: vh pRgitE purK BgvMq rUp; gur goibMd sUrw [

Dr. Jodh Singh.translation: Who is spectacular, and with his marvels, profusely he is Satguru, the True Lord.

lines.gurmukhi: AnMd ibnodI jIA jip; scu scI vylw [

Dr. Jodh Singh.translation: Remember day and night, the virtues of Har who, at the times honest, endows truth.

lines.gurmukhi: vwh vwh goibMd isMG; Awpy guru cylw [14[

Dr. Jodh Singh.translation: Hail, hail (Guru) Gobind Singh; He, Himself, is the Master and the Disciple too.

lines.gurmukhi: Eh guru goibMd huie pRgitAw; dsvyN Avqwrw [

Dr. Jodh Singh.translation: Guru Gobind Singh manifested as the tenth incarnation.

lines.gurmukhi: ijn AlK Apwr inrMjnw; jipE krqwrw [

Dr. Jodh Singh.translation: He inspired the meditation upon the imperceptible, timeless and flawless Creator.

lines.gurmukhi: inj pMQ clwieE Kwlsw; Dir qyj krwrw [

Dr. Jodh Singh.translation: And initiated the Khalsa Panth, the Religious Path of Righteousness, and bequeathed scintillating splendour.

lines.gurmukhi: isr kys Dwir kr KVg ko; sB dust pCwrw [

Dr. Jodh Singh.translation: Head high with full tresses, and the sword in hand, (the Panth) eliminated the adversaries,

lines.gurmukhi: sIl jq kI kC pihir; pkiVE hiQAwrw [

Dr. Jodh Singh.translation: Wearing the breaches, the symbol of chastity, raised the arms,

lines.gurmukhi: sc Pqy bulweI gurU kI; jIiqE rx Bwrw [

Dr. Jodh Singh.translation: Roaring the war-cries of Victory to the Guru, prevailed in the immense battlefields,

lines.gurmukhi: sB dYq Airin ko Gyr kir; kIjY pirhwrw [

Dr. Jodh Singh.translation: Rounded up all the devilish foes and annihilated them.

lines.gurmukhi: jb sihjy pRgitE jgq mYN; guru jwp Apwrw [

Dr. Jodh Singh.translation: And then docilely manifested the appraisal of great Guru in the world.

lines.gurmukhi: XON aupjy isMG BujMgIey; nIlMbr Dwrw [

Dr. Jodh Singh.translation: Thus descended the young Singhs, the lions, like the rain showers from the blue sky,

lines.gurmukhi: qurk dust sB CY kIey; hir nwm aucwrw [

Dr. Jodh Singh.translation: Who eliminated all the Turk (ruling Muslim) enemies and promoted the God's Name.

lines.gurmukhi: iqn AwgY koie n TihirE; Bwgy isrdwrw [

Dr. Jodh Singh.translation: None dared to face them, and all the chieftains took to their heels.

lines.gurmukhi: jh rwjySwh AmIrVy; hoey sB Cwrw [

Dr. Jodh Singh.translation: The kings, sovereigns and emirates, all of them were decimated.

lines.gurmukhi: iPr sun kir AYsI Dmk ko; kWpY igir Bwrw [

Dr. Jodh Singh.translation: With high pitched drum-beats (of victory), even the mountains shuddered.

lines.gurmukhi: qb sB DrqI hl cl BeI; Cwfy Gr bwrw [

Dr. Jodh Singh.translation: The upheaval ruffled the earth and people forsook their domiciles.

lines.gurmukhi: ieauN AYsy duMd klyS mYN; KipE sMswrw [

Dr. Jodh Singh.translation: In such a conflict and distress, the world was absorbed.

lines.gurmukhi: qih ibn siqgur ko hY nhI; BY kwtnhwrw [

Dr. Jodh Singh.translation: And there was none else than the True Guru who could eradicate the fright.

lines.gurmukhi: gih AYsy KVg idKwieAn; ko skY n Jylw [

Dr. Jodh Singh.translation: He (the True Guru), beholding the sword, displayed the feats bearable to none.

lines.gurmukhi: vwh vwh goibMd isMG; Awpy guru cylw [15[

Dr. Jodh Singh.translation: Hail, hail (Guru) Gobind Singh; He, Himself, is the Master and the Disciple too.

lines.gurmukhi: gurubr Akwl ky hukm soN; aupijE ibigAwnw [

Dr. Jodh Singh.translation: With the command of the Timeless, the Supreme True Guru, proclaimed the self-realisation,

lines.gurmukhi: qb sihjy ricE Kwlsw; swbq mrdwnw [

Dr. Jodh Singh.translation: And then, steadfastly, created Khalsa, the righteous ones, with the undefiled human form.

lines.gurmukhi: ieauN auTy isMG Bbkwr kY; sB jg frpwnw [

Dr. Jodh Singh.translation: The Singhs rose up roaring and whole world was over-awed.

lines.gurmukhi: mVI dyvl gor msIq; Fwh kIey mYdwnw [

Dr. Jodh Singh.translation: They decimated and raised to the ground the (ritualistic) cemeteries, crematoriums, temples and mosques.

lines.gurmukhi: byd purwn Kt swsqRw; Pun imty kurwnw [

Dr. Jodh Singh.translation: (Compulsive) readings of Vedas, Puranas, Six-shastras and Quran was abolished.

lines.gurmukhi: bWg slwq imtwie kir; mwry sulqwnw [

Dr. Jodh Singh.translation: Baangs, the calls for Muslim prayers, were ousted and the kings were abolished.

lines.gurmukhi: mIr pIr sB Cip gey; mzHbo aultwnw [

Dr. Jodh Singh.translation: Temporal and spiritual leaders were obscured, and all the religions became topsy-turvey.

lines.gurmukhi: mlvwny kwzI iPir Qky; kuC mrm n jwnw [

Dr. Jodh Singh.translation: The Muslim priests and justices deciphered hard but could not comprehend dissolution.

lines.gurmukhi: lK pMifq bRhmn joqkI; ibK rs aurJwnw [

Dr. Jodh Singh.translation: Millions of Brahamin scholars and astrologers were venomously entangled,

lines.gurmukhi: Pun pwQr dyvl pUij kY; Aiq hI Brmwnw [

Dr. Jodh Singh.translation: And were drowned in extreme fallacies of worshipping the idols and gods.

lines.gurmukhi: ieauN dono iPrky kpt mYN; rc rhy indwnw [

Dr. Jodh Singh.translation: Thus, both the ignorant faiths, muffled in hypocrisy, were lagging behind.

lines.gurmukhi: ieh qIsr mzhb ^wlsw; aupijE prDwnw [

Dr. Jodh Singh.translation: Then the third religion, Khalsa, manifested triumphantly.

lines.gurmukhi: ijin gur goibMd ky hukm soN; gih KVg idKwnw [

Dr. Jodh Singh.translation: By the command of Guru Gobind Singh, they brandished the swords held high.

lines.gurmukhi: iqh sB dustn kau Cyid kY; Akwl jpwnw [

Dr. Jodh Singh.translation: They exterminated all the scoundrels and order of the Timeless One.

lines.gurmukhi: iPr AYsw hukm Akwl kw; jg mYN pRgtwnw [

Dr. Jodh Singh.translation: And this way they revealed the command of the Timeless in the world.

lines.gurmukhi: qb suMnq koie n kir skY; kWipE qurkwnw [

Dr. Jodh Singh.translation: Turks, the Muslims, dreaded and none actuated the circumcision

lines.gurmukhi: ieauN aumq sB muhMmdI; Kip geI indwnw [

Dr. Jodh Singh.translation: Consequently, the following of Mohammed submerged in ignorance.

lines.gurmukhi: qb Pqy fMk jg mYN Gury; duK duMd imtwnw [

Dr. Jodh Singh.translation: Then the drumbeats of victory terminated all the adversities.

lines.gurmukhi: ieauN qIsr pMQ clwieAn; vf sUr ghylw [

Dr. Jodh Singh.translation: And thus was proclaimed the great and valorous Third Faith.

lines.gurmukhi: vwh vwh goibMd isMG; Awpy gur cylw [16[

Dr. Jodh Singh.translation: Hail, hail (Guru) Gobind Singh; He, Himself, is the Master and the Disciple too.

lines.gurmukhi: jgy isMG blvMq bIr; sB dust Kpwey [

Dr. Jodh Singh.translation: Brave and stalwart Singhs awoke and obliterated all the enemies.

lines.gurmukhi: dIn muhMmd auT gieE; ihMdk Tihrwey [

Dr. Jodh Singh.translation: Muslim faith evaporated and Hindu's remained in scarcity.

lines.gurmukhi: qh klmw koie n piVH skY; nhIN izkru Alwey [

Dr. Jodh Singh.translation: Neither there was any body to recite the Muslim Verses nor there was talk of Allah, the Muslim God.

lines.gurmukhi: invwz drUd n Pwiqhw; nh lMf ktwey [

Dr. Jodh Singh.translation: Neither any one called for Nimaz, the Muslim prayer, nor they said Darrod, the benedictions. Fatima was remembered not and none revelled in circumcision.

lines.gurmukhi: Xih rwh SrIAq myt kir; muslm Brmwey [

Dr. Jodh Singh.translation: This path of Shariyat (Muslim Divine Law) erased, Muslims were perplexed.

lines.gurmukhi: guru Pqy bulweI sBn kau; sc Kyl rcwey [

Dr. Jodh Singh.translation: By applauding all and sundry, the Guru exhibited the operation of Truth,

lines.gurmukhi: inj dohI iPrI goibMd kI; Akwl jpwey [

Dr. Jodh Singh.translation: Then circulated (Guru) Gobind's order to reflect upon the Timeless One.

lines.gurmukhi: sB jg iqnhUM lUt kir; qurkW cuix Kwey [

Dr. Jodh Singh.translation: They picked all the cruel Turks in the world, and plundered and liquidated them.

lines.gurmukhi: iPr suK aupjwey jgq mY; sB duK ibsrwey [

Dr. Jodh Singh.translation: Thus there prevailed the universal serenity and disregard for the tribulations.

lines.gurmukhi: inj sUry isMG virAwmVy; bhu lwK jgwey [

Dr. Jodh Singh.translation: And then he stimulated brave warrior Singhs in hundreds of thousands.

lines.gurmukhi: iqh inrBau rwj kmwieAnu; sc Adl clwey [

Dr. Jodh Singh.translation: The sovereignty of the Fearless predominated and justice was determined by the Truth.

lines.gurmukhi: ieauN kiljug mY Avqwr Dwir; siqjug vrqwey [

Dr. Jodh Singh.translation: Thus incarnating in the Kal-age, he unfolded Satjug, the Golden Age of Truth.

lines.gurmukhi: sB qurk mlyC Kpwie kir; sc bxq bnwey [

Dr. Jodh Singh.translation: Abolishing all the Turks and barbarians, he inspired fidelity.

lines.gurmukhi: qb skl jgq kau suK dIey; duK mwir htwey [

Dr. Jodh Singh.translation: The ailments were driven away from the entire world and blessings conferred.

lines.gurmukhi: ieauN hukm BieE krqwr kw; sB duMd imtwey [

Dr. Jodh Singh.translation: Thus the Creator's order was enacted and all the contentions effaced.

lines.gurmukhi: qb shjy Drm pRgwisAw; hir hir js gwey [

Dr. Jodh Singh.translation: Then consistently the righteousness manifested and the praises of Har were articulated.

lines.gurmukhi: vh pRgitE mrd AgMmVw; virAwm iekylw [

Dr. Jodh Singh.translation: Hail! The Impervious Being was manifested and heralded as the one and only hero.

lines.gurmukhi: vwh vwh goibMd isMG; Awpy guru cylw [17[

Dr. Jodh Singh.translation: Hail, hail (Guru) Gobind Singh; He, Himself, is the Master and the Disciple too.

lines.gurmukhi: inj Pqy bulweI siqgurU; kIno aujIAwrw [

Dr. Jodh Singh.translation: Himself, the True Guru invoked Fateh, the greeting of victory, and spread the divine light.

lines.gurmukhi: JUT kpt sB Cip gey; sB sc vrqwrw [

Dr. Jodh Singh.translation: The falsehood and maliciousness vanished and truth triumphed.

lines.gurmukhi: iPr jg hom Tihrwie kY; inj Drm svwrw [

Dr. Jodh Singh.translation: Desisting from the (rituals of) Yajana and Havana, righteousness was promoted.

lines.gurmukhi: qurk duMd sB auT gieE; ricE jYkwrw [

Dr. Jodh Singh.translation: All the contention of Turks were eliminated, and the (Khalsa) ovation was permeated.

lines.gurmukhi: jh aupjy isMG mhW blI; Kwls inrDwrw [

Dr. Jodh Singh.translation: Thus were promulgated Singhs, the emphatic and the righteous ones.

lines.gurmukhi: sB jg iqnhUM bs kIE; jp AlK Apwrw [

Dr. Jodh Singh.translation: The whole world was brought to order and they meditated upon the magnanimous invisible.

lines.gurmukhi: gur Drm ismir jg cmikE; imitE AMiDAwrw [

Dr. Jodh Singh.translation: Deliberating on the Guru's Righteous-path, (celestial) light beamed and the darkness (of the ignorance) was effaced.

lines.gurmukhi: qb kusl Kym AwnMd isauN; bisE sMswrw [

Dr. Jodh Singh.translation: And then the happiness, welfare and bliss prospered in the whole world.

lines.gurmukhi: hir vwihgurU mMqr AgMm; jg qwrnhwrw [

Dr. Jodh Singh.translation: The emancipator Guru (advanced) the incantation of Har, Wahiguru, God the Supreme, Har, Wahiguru.

lines.gurmukhi: jo ismrih nr pRym isau; phuˆcY drbwrw [

Dr. Jodh Singh.translation: The ones who meditates with devotion, realise the sublime court.

lines.gurmukhi: sB pkVo crn goibMd ky; Cwfo jMjwrw [

Dr. Jodh Singh.translation: Embrace (you) all at the Guru's feet and get red of the perplexities.

lines.gurmukhi: nwqru drgh kutIAnu; mnmuiK kUiVAwrw [

Dr. Jodh Singh.translation: Only the egocentric and the false ones get punished in the Righteous Court.

lines.gurmukhi: qh CutY soeI ju hir BjY; sB qjY ibkwrw [

Dr. Jodh Singh.translation: Only they, who ponder over Har, accomplish the astral heights and the rest remain fruitless.

lines.gurmukhi: ies mn cMcl kau Gyr kir; ismrY krqwrw [

Dr. Jodh Singh.translation: By controlling the inconsistent mind, remember the Creator.

lines.gurmukhi: qb phuMcY hir hukm isauN; inj dsvYN duAwrw [

Dr. Jodh Singh.translation: Then with the heavenly command, one overwhelms the tenth door (of inner soul),

lines.gurmukhi: iPr ieauN sihjy BytY ggn mY; Awqm inrDwrw [

Dr. Jodh Singh.translation: And intuitively presents himself in the Godly domain for spiritual judgement.

lines.gurmukhi: qb vY inrKYN surg mYN; AwnMd suhylw [

Dr. Jodh Singh.translation: Sequentially, in the heaven, his spiritual evaluation is appreciated.

lines.gurmukhi: vwh vwh goibMd isMG; Awpy guru cylw [18[

Dr. Jodh Singh.translation: Hail, hail (Guru) Gobind Singh; He, Himself, is the Master and the Disciple too.

lines.gurmukhi: vih aupijE cylw mrd kw; mrdwn sdwey [

Dr. Jodh Singh.translation: Hail! God's disciple was born and recognised as a great hero.

lines.gurmukhi: ijin sB ipRQvI kau jIq kir; nIswn Julwey [

Dr. Jodh Singh.translation: He triumphed over the whole world and unfurled the sacred flags.

lines.gurmukhi: qb isMGn kau bKs kir; bhu suK idKlwey [

Dr. Jodh Singh.translation: Protected all the Singhs, and endowed them with bliss.

lines.gurmukhi: iPr sB ipRQvI ky aUpry; hwkm Tihrwey [

Dr. Jodh Singh.translation: Then controlled the entire society, and explained the commands.

lines.gurmukhi: iqnhUˆ jgq sMBwl kir; AwnMd rcwey [

Dr. Jodh Singh.translation: Promoted good order in the world and inspired exhilaration.

lines.gurmukhi: qh ismir ismir Akwl kau; hir hir gun gwey [

Dr. Jodh Singh.translation: Meditated and ruminated over the Timeless One, and glorified Har, the God Almighty.

lines.gurmukhi: vwh guru goibMd gwjI sbl; ijin isMG jgwey [

Dr. Jodh Singh.translation: Exalted Guru Gobind Singh instituted mighty crusading Singhs.

lines.gurmukhi: qb BieE jgq sB Kwlsw; mnmuK Brmwey [

Dr. Jodh Singh.translation: Thus abounded in the world, Khalsa, the righteous ones, and the heretics were deluded.

lines.gurmukhi: ieauN auiT Bbky bl bIr isMG; ssqR Jmkwey [

Dr. Jodh Singh.translation: The mighty Singhs rose and made their arms to shine.

lines.gurmukhi: qb sB qurkn ko Cyd kir; Akwl jpwey [

Dr. Jodh Singh.translation: All the Turks were subjugated and made to ponder over the Timeless.

lines.gurmukhi: sB CqRpqI cuin cuin hqy; khUM itkin n pwey [

Dr. Jodh Singh.translation: Putting aside all the Kashatriyas, they let them had no peace.

lines.gurmukhi: qb jg mYN Drm pRgwisE; scu hukm clwey [

Dr. Jodh Singh.translation: The righteousness manifested the world and Truth was proclaimed.

lines.gurmukhi: Xh bwrh sdI inbyV kir; gur Pqy bulwey [

Dr. Jodh Singh.translation: Eradicating the influence of twelve centuries, the Guru's slogan ravelled,

lines.gurmukhi: qb dust mlyC sihjy Kpy; Cl kpt aufwey [

Dr. Jodh Singh.translation: Which indulgently invalidated all the enemies and barbarians, and the hypocrisy took to its wings.

lines.gurmukhi: ieauN hir Akwl ky hukm soN; rx juD mcwey [

Dr. Jodh Singh.translation: The world was won over thus and truth was crowned, and set on its throne.

lines.gurmukhi: qb kudy isMG BujMgIey; dl ktk aufwey [

Dr. Jodh Singh.translation: The world was consoled, and the devotees were induced towards Har.

lines.gurmukhi: ieauN Pqy BeI jg jIq kir; scu qKq rcwey [

Dr. Jodh Singh.translation: All the humanity was blessed and the afflictions were wiped out.

lines.gurmukhi: bhu dIE idlwsw jgq ko; hir Bgiq idRVwey [
qb sB ipRQvI suKIAw BeI; duK drd gvwey [
iPr suK inhcl bKisE jgq; BY qRws cukwey [

Dr. Jodh Singh.translation: Then with the eternal benediction, the anxiety in the world was alleviated.

lines.gurmukhi: gurdws KVw dr pkiV kY; ieauN aucir suxwey [

Dr. Jodh Singh.translation: Gurdas, leaning on the door, was eulogising this;

lines.gurmukhi: hy siqgur jm qRws soN; muih lyhu Cufwey [

Dr. Jodh Singh.translation: `Oh my True Lord! Please save me from the trepidation of the Yamas.

lines.gurmukhi: jb hauN dwsn ko dwsro; gur tihl kmwey [

Dr. Jodh Singh.translation: `Enable me, the servant of servants, to earn the favour of the Guru,

lines.gurmukhi: qb CUtY bMDn skl; Pun nrik n jwey [

Dr. Jodh Singh.translation: `So that all the restraints are erased, and one retreats not to the hell.'

lines.gurmukhi: hir dwsW icMidAw sd sdw; gur sMgiq mylw [

Dr. Jodh Singh.translation: Har was always anxious for his devotees and, thus, the devotees's (divine) union was obvious.

lines.gurmukhi: vwh vwh goibMd isMG; Awpy guru cylw [19[

Dr. Jodh Singh.translation: Hail, hail (Guru) Gobind Singh; He, Himself, is the Master and the Disciple too.

lines.gurmukhi: sMq Bgq gur isK hih; jg qwrn Awey [

Dr. Jodh Singh.translation: The saints and devotees, who are the Sikhs of Guru (Gobind Singh), have come for the deliverance of the world.

lines.gurmukhi: sy praupkwrI jg mo; guru mMqR jpwey [

Dr. Jodh Singh.translation: And these generous ones are causing the world meditate upon the Guru's incantation,

lines.gurmukhi: jp qp sMjm swD kir; hir Bgiq kmwey [

Dr. Jodh Singh.translation: The Sewak, the devoted adherent, who meditates on the Naam (of the Creator) is sanctified.

lines.gurmukhi: qih syvk so prvwn hY; hir nwm idRVwey [

Dr. Jodh Singh.translation: With deliberation, penance and austerity, the devotee achieves godliness,

lines.gurmukhi: kwm kroD Pun loB moh; AhMkwr cukwey [

Dr. Jodh Singh.translation: And abandons sensuality, wrath, greed arrogance and infatuation.

lines.gurmukhi: jog jugiq Git swD kir; pauxw Tihrwey [

Dr. Jodh Singh.translation: He reforms with capable strategy, and domineers the mind wavering wind,

lines.gurmukhi: qb Kt ckrw sihjy Gury; ggnw Gir Cwey [

Dr. Jodh Singh.translation: Six spheres (of bodily self-control) overpowered, he eventually, overwhelms the divine heights.

lines.gurmukhi: inj suMn smwiD lgwie kY; Anhd ilv lwey [

Dr. Jodh Singh.translation: Then he proceeds, with honour, towards the heavenly abode with a virtuous appearance.

lines.gurmukhi: qb drgh muK aujly; piq isauN Gir jwey [

Dr. Jodh Singh.translation: One who narrates the glory of (Guru) Nanak, is the bravest of all.

lines.gurmukhi: klI kwl mrdwn mrd; nwnk gun gwey [

Dr. Jodh Singh.translation: And the one who recounts this Epic of Bhagauti, attains the Eternal status.

lines.gurmukhi: Xh vwr BgauqI jo pVHY; Amrwpd pwey [

Dr. Jodh Singh.translation: Neither he faces the distress nor repentance; rather he prevails in bliss.

lines.gurmukhi: iqh dUK sMqwp n kCu lgY; AwnMd vrqwey [

Dr. Jodh Singh.translation: Whatever he desires, he achieves and, through his heart, invokes the invisible.

lines.gurmukhi: iPr jo icqvY soeI lhY; Git AlK lKwey [

Dr. Jodh Singh.translation: For that, he, day and night, recounts this Epic from his mouth,

lines.gurmukhi: qb ins idn ies vwr soN; muK pwT sunwey [

Dr. Jodh Singh.translation: To earn freedom from the urge for material things, attains salvation and flies to rapturous heights.

lines.gurmukhi: so lhY pdwrQ mukiq pd; ciVH ggn smwey [

Dr. Jodh Singh.translation: There remains no challenge of Yamas,

lines.gurmukhi: qb kCU n pUCy jm Drm; sB pwp imtwey [

Dr. Jodh Singh.translation: and Righteousness eliminates all the transgressions.

lines.gurmukhi: qb lgY n iqsu jm fMf duK; nihˆ hoie duhylw [

Dr. Jodh Singh.translation: No punishment of the Yamas remains effective, and the adversities become not troublesome.

lines.gurmukhi: vwh vwh goibMd isMG Awpy guru cylw [20[

Dr. Jodh Singh.translation: Hail, hail (Guru) Gobind Singh; He, Himself, is the Master and the Disciple too.

lines.gurmukhi: hir siqgur nwnk; Kyl rcwieAw [

Dr. Jodh Singh.translation: Guru Nanak, the embodiment of God Himself, permeated this (godly) operation.

lines.gurmukhi: AMgd kau pRBu; AlK lKwieAw [

Dr. Jodh Singh.translation: And invoked sacred writ on (Guru) Angad.

lines.gurmukhi: ipRQm mhl; hr nwmu jpwieE [

Dr. Jodh Singh.translation: In the first manifestation, he expounded the Naam (the Creator in His Creator).

lines.gurmukhi: duqIey AMgd; hir gux gwieE [

Dr. Jodh Singh.translation: And the second, (Guru) Angad sang the benevolence of Har.

lines.gurmukhi: qIsr mhl; Amr prDwnw [

Dr. Jodh Singh.translation: In the Third revelation, (Guru) Amar Das captured the mind with the Eternal Word,

lines.gurmukhi: ijh Gt mih inrKy; hir Bgvwnw [

Dr. Jodh Singh.translation: By which he had envisaged the Lord God in his heart.

lines.gurmukhi: jl BirE; siqguru ky duAwry [

Dr. Jodh Singh.translation: He served his True Guru by fetching water to his (Guru's) abode,

lines.gurmukhi: qb ieh pwieE; mhl Apwry [

Dr. Jodh Singh.translation: And, thus, obtained the divine throne.

lines.gurmukhi: guru rwmdws; cauQy prgwsw [

Dr. Jodh Singh.translation: In the fourth personification, appeared Guru Ram Dass,

lines.gurmukhi: ijin rty inrMjn; pRBu Aibnwsw [

Dr. Jodh Singh.translation: Who recapitulated the faultless Immortal-being,

lines.gurmukhi: gurU Arjn; pMcm TihrwieE [

Dr. Jodh Singh.translation: And confirmed fifth pontification upon Guru Arjan,

lines.gurmukhi: ijn sbd suDwr; grMQ bxwieE [

Dr. Jodh Singh.translation: Who with the treasure of nectarous Word, compiled the Granth (the book of Holy Scriptures).

lines.gurmukhi: gRMQ bxwie; aucwr sunwieE [

Dr. Jodh Singh.translation: Creating the Granth, he pronounced:

lines.gurmukhi: qb srb jgq mY; pwT rcwieE [

Dr. Jodh Singh.translation: The whole world to reiterate the Sermons,

lines.gurmukhi: kir pwT gRMQ; jgq sB qirE [

Dr. Jodh Singh.translation: And with the Sermons from the Granth, the world emancipated.

lines.gurmukhi: ijh ins bwsur; hir nwm aucirE [

Dr. Jodh Singh.translation: But the emancipated were those who, day and night, recollected the Naam.

lines.gurmukhi: gur hirgoibMd; Kstm Avqwry [

Dr. Jodh Singh.translation: Then was embodied Guru Hargobind, the sixth master,

lines.gurmukhi: ijin pkiV qyg; bhu dust pCwry [

Dr. Jodh Singh.translation: Who, with sword held high, prostrated the enemies.

lines.gurmukhi: ieauN sB mugln kw; mn baurwnw [

Dr. Jodh Singh.translation: He made the minds of Muslim rulers demented,

lines.gurmukhi: qb hir Bgqn soN; duMd rcwnw [

Dr. Jodh Singh.translation: And for the sake of his devotees he rose and initiated (upon them) the war of attrition.

lines.gurmukhi: ieauN kir hY; gurdws pukwrw [

Dr. Jodh Singh.translation: And thus exclaimed Gurdas;

lines.gurmukhi: hy siqguru muih lyhu aubwrw [21[

Dr. Jodh Singh.translation: O my True Guru, You grant me redemption.

lines.gurmukhi: spqm mihl; Agm hir rwieAw [

Dr. Jodh Singh.translation: The Impervious God personified (Guru) Har Rai as the seventh Master.

lines.gurmukhi: ijn suMn iDAwn kir; jog kmwieAw [

Dr. Jodh Singh.translation: He had ascertained from the Desireless Lord, and achieved the significance.

lines.gurmukhi: ciVH ggn guPw mih; rihE smweI [

Dr. Jodh Singh.translation: Ascending from the celestial cave he remained absorbed (in the Almighty).

lines.gurmukhi: jhw bYT Afol; smwiD lgweI [

Dr. Jodh Singh.translation: And always sat unperturbed in contemplation.

lines.gurmukhi: sB klw KYNc kir; gupq rhwXM [

Dr. Jodh Singh.translation: Acquired all the faculties but remained latent.

lines.gurmukhi: qih Apx rUp ko; nihˆ idKlwXM [

Dr. Jodh Singh.translation: And to none he revealed his personal-self.

lines.gurmukhi: ieauN ies prkwr; gudwr mcwieE [

Dr. Jodh Singh.translation: Thus, he elevated the prominence of the Holy Spirit.

lines.gurmukhi: qh dyv AMs ko; bhu cmkwieE [

Dr. Jodh Singh.translation: The potent and courageous (Guru) Harkrishan became the eighth Master,

lines.gurmukhi: hirik®sn BXo; Astm bl bIrw [

Dr. Jodh Singh.translation: Who abandoned his temporal being at Delhi.

lines.gurmukhi: ijn phuMic dyhlI; qijE srIrw [

Dr. Jodh Singh.translation: Becoming apparent, at the age of innocence, he displayed ingenuity,

lines.gurmukhi: bwl rUp Dir; sÍWg rcwieE [

Dr. Jodh Singh.translation: And serenely relinquished the body and ascended (to the heavenly abode).

lines.gurmukhi: qb sihjy qn ko; Coif isDwieE [

Dr. Jodh Singh.translation: Thus, slamming ignominy on the heads of Mughal Rulers,

lines.gurmukhi: ieau muglin sIs; prI bhu Cwrw [

Dr. Jodh Singh.translation: He, Himself, reached the Court of Righteousness with honour.

lines.gurmukhi: vY Kud piq so; phuMcy drbwrw [

Dr. Jodh Singh.translation: Thence on Aurangzeb initiated the altercation,

lines.gurmukhi: AOrMgy; ieh bwd rcwieE [

Dr. Jodh Singh.translation: And earned the desolation of his lineage.

lines.gurmukhi: iqn Apnw kul; sB nws krwieE [

Dr. Jodh Singh.translation: By quarrelling and squabbling the Mughals decimated each others;

lines.gurmukhi: ieau Thik Thik; muglin isir JwrI [

Dr. Jodh Singh.translation: That was the way, all the sinners trailed to the hell.

lines.gurmukhi: Pun hoie pwpI; vh nrk isDwrI [

Dr. Jodh Singh.translation: And thus exclaimed Gurdas;

lines.gurmukhi: ieauN kir hY; gurdws pukwrw [
hy siqgur; muih lyhu aubwrw [22[

Dr. Jodh Singh.translation: O my True Guru, You grant me redemption.

lines.gurmukhi: gurU nwnk; sB ky isr qwjw [

Dr. Jodh Singh.translation: Above us all, Guru Nanak is the paramount,

lines.gurmukhi: ijh kau ismir; sry sB kwjw [

Dr. Jodh Singh.translation: Meditating on whom, all the missions are accomplished.

lines.gurmukhi: gur qyg bhwdr; sÍWg rcwXM [

Dr. Jodh Singh.translation: Then Guru Tegh Bahadur performed the wonderment;

lines.gurmukhi: ijh Apn sIs dy; jg ThrwXM [

Dr. Jodh Singh.translation: Liberated the world by sacrificing his head.

lines.gurmukhi: ies ibiD; mugln ko BrmwieE [

Dr. Jodh Singh.translation: This way, left the Mughals in bewilderment,

lines.gurmukhi: qb siqguru Apnw; bl n jnwieE [

Dr. Jodh Singh.translation: As he did not demonstrate the power of his manifestation,

lines.gurmukhi: pRBu hukm bUiJ; phuMcy drbwrw [

Dr. Jodh Singh.translation: And acquiescing to the God's Will he realised the Heavenly Court.

lines.gurmukhi: qb siqguru kInI; imhr Apwrw [

Dr. Jodh Singh.translation: The True Guru, thus revealed his kind indulgence.

lines.gurmukhi: ieauN muglin ko; doK lgwnw [

Dr. Jodh Singh.translation: The Mughals were declared as guilty,

lines.gurmukhi: hoie Krwb; Kip gey indwnw [

Dr. Jodh Singh.translation: And with admonishment they were invalidated.

lines.gurmukhi: ieauN nauN mihloN; kI jugiq sunweI [

Dr. Jodh Singh.translation: With this I have related the contrivance of the Great Masters,

lines.gurmukhi: ijh kir ismrn; hir Bgiq rcweI [

Dr. Jodh Singh.translation: Who, with the remembrance of God, salvaged their devotees.

lines.gurmukhi: hir Bgiq rcwie; nwm insqwry [

Dr. Jodh Singh.translation: Then the whole universe offered ovation.

lines.gurmukhi: qb sB jg mY; pRgitE jYkwry [
ieauN kir hY; gurdws pukwrw [

Dr. Jodh Singh.translation: And thus exclaimed Gurdas;

lines.gurmukhi: hy siqguru muih lyhu aubwrw [23[

Dr. Jodh Singh.translation: O my True Guru, You grant me redemption.

lines.gurmukhi: Eh guru goibMd isMG; dsvW Avqwrw [

Dr. Jodh Singh.translation: Guru Gobind Singh, the Tenth incarnation,

lines.gurmukhi: ijn Kwlsw pMQ; AjIq suDwrw [

Dr. Jodh Singh.translation: Who regenerated the triumphant Khalsa Panth, the righteous denomination,

lines.gurmukhi: qurk dust sB; mwir ibdwry [

Dr. Jodh Singh.translation: Decimated all the Turk enemies,

lines.gurmukhi: sB ipRQvI; kInI guljwry [

Dr. Jodh Singh.translation: Thus turned the whole earth into a subsisting garden.

lines.gurmukhi: ieauN pRgty isMG; mhW blbIrw [

Dr. Jodh Singh.translation: Great warriors were embodied,

lines.gurmukhi: iqn Awgy; ko DrY n DIrw [

Dr. Jodh Singh.translation: Whom no one could dare to confront.

lines.gurmukhi: Pqy BeI; duK duMd imtwey [

Dr. Jodh Singh.translation: Victory predominated and all the tribulations and conflicts were erased,

lines.gurmukhi: qh hir Akwl kw; jwp jpwey [

Dr. Jodh Singh.translation: And the meditation upon the God, the Timeless, was inducted.

lines.gurmukhi: ipRQm mhl; jipE krqwrw [

Dr. Jodh Singh.translation: In the first instance, the Master resolved to ruminate over the Creator,

lines.gurmukhi: iqn sB ipRQvI ko; lIE aubwrw [

Dr. Jodh Singh.translation: And then he kindled the whole universe.

lines.gurmukhi: hir Bgiq idRVwie; nrU sB qwry [

Dr. Jodh Singh.translation: The devotees became resolute, and the divine light released all.

lines.gurmukhi: jb AwigAw kInI; AlK Apwry [

Dr. Jodh Singh.translation: When God invoked his command,

lines.gurmukhi: ieauN siq sMgiq kw; myl imlwXM [

Dr. Jodh Singh.translation: Then, they encountered the holy congregation,

lines.gurmukhi: jh ins bwsur; hir hir gun gwXM [

Dr. Jodh Singh.translation: To enunciate the admiration of the Lord God, day and night,

lines.gurmukhi: ieauN kir hY; gurdws pukwrw [

Dr. Jodh Singh.translation: And thus exclaimed Gurdas;

lines.gurmukhi: hy siqguru muih lyhu aubwrw [24[

Dr. Jodh Singh.translation: O my True Guru, You grant me redemption.

lines.gurmukhi: qUM AlK Apwr; inrMjn dyvw [

Dr. Jodh Singh.translation: Magnanimously, You, the formless, are the Unsustained Holy Spirit.

lines.gurmukhi: ijh bRhmw ibsnu isv; lKY n Byvw [

Dr. Jodh Singh.translation: Brahma, Vishnu and Shiva could not unravel your mystery.

lines.gurmukhi: qum nwQ inrMjn; ghr gMBIry [

Dr. Jodh Singh.translation: You, my Lord, are faultless and contemplative.

lines.gurmukhi: qum crnin soN; bWDy DIry [

Dr. Jodh Singh.translation: With the touch of Your feet, grant us endurance,

lines.gurmukhi: Ab gih pkirE; qumrw drbwrw [

Dr. Jodh Singh.translation: As I have sought the protection of Your Court.

lines.gurmukhi: ijauN jwnhu; iqauN lyhu suDwrw [

Dr. Jodh Singh.translation: What ever may be the means, please regenerate us,

lines.gurmukhi: hm kwmI k®oDI; Aiq kUiVAwry [

Dr. Jodh Singh.translation: The ones sunk in lust, avarice, and falsehood.

lines.gurmukhi: qum hI Twkur bKsnhwry [

Dr. Jodh Singh.translation: You, my Master, are the exonerator,

lines.gurmukhi: nhIN koeI qum ibxu; Avru hmwrw [

Dr. Jodh Singh.translation: And without You none empathizes with us,

lines.gurmukhi: jo kir hY; hmrI pRiqpwrw [

Dr. Jodh Singh.translation: To provide us with sustenance.

lines.gurmukhi: qum Agm Afol; Aqol inrwly [

Dr. Jodh Singh.translation: You are profound, unperturbed, unparallel and unique.

lines.gurmukhi: sB jg kI; kirho pRiqpwly [

Dr. Jodh Singh.translation: The whole universe is provided livelihood by You.

lines.gurmukhi: jl Ql mhIAl; hukm qumwrw [

Dr. Jodh Singh.translation: Your order predominates the land, water and void.

lines.gurmukhi: qum kau ismir; qirE sMswrw [

Dr. Jodh Singh.translation: And by reflecting upon You, whole mankind swims across.

lines.gurmukhi: ieauN kir hY; gurdws pukwrw [

Dr. Jodh Singh.translation: And thus exclaimed Gurdas;

lines.gurmukhi: hy siqguru muih lyhu aubwrw [25[

Dr. Jodh Singh.translation: O my True Guru, You grant me redemption.

lines.gurmukhi: qum ACl ACyd; AByd khwXM [

Dr. Jodh Singh.translation: You became known as impregnable, indiscriminate, and free of deception.

lines.gurmukhi: jhw bYiT qKq pr; hukm clwXM [

Dr. Jodh Singh.translation: And from Your celestial throne, passed Your commands.

lines.gurmukhi: quJ ibnu dUsir; Avr n koeI [

Dr. Jodh Singh.translation: None other than You is our protector.

lines.gurmukhi: qum eyko eyku; inrMjn soeI [

Dr. Jodh Singh.translation: You are the only impeccable,

lines.gurmukhi: EAMkwr Dir; Kyl rcwXM [

Dr. Jodh Singh.translation: Who, as the saviour of all, inaugurates the temporal play,

lines.gurmukhi: qum Awp Agocr; gupq rhwXM [

Dr. Jodh Singh.translation: And You, Yourself, remain absolute and latent,

lines.gurmukhi: pRB qumrw Kyl; Agm inrDwry [

Dr. Jodh Singh.translation: But Your unaccessible play persists with determination,

lines.gurmukhi: qum sB Gt BIqr; sB qy nXwry [

Dr. Jodh Singh.translation: And, in a unique way, You sojourn all the hearts.

lines.gurmukhi: qum AYsw Acrj; Kyl bnwieE [

Dr. Jodh Singh.translation: This way You produce a marvellous play,

lines.gurmukhi: ijh lK bRhmMf ko; Dwir KpwieE [

Dr. Jodh Singh.translation: In which You absorb hundreds of thousands of universes.

lines.gurmukhi: pRBu qumrw mrmu; n iknhU liKE [

Dr. Jodh Singh.translation: But without pondering over You, none will be consumed.

lines.gurmukhi: jh sB jg; JUTy DMdy KipE [

Dr. Jodh Singh.translation: Only those get deliverance, who rely on You.

lines.gurmukhi: ibnu ismrn qy; CUtY n koeI [

Dr. Jodh Singh.translation: Destitute Gurdas is Your disciple,

lines.gurmukhi: qum ko BjY; su mukqw hoeI [

Dr. Jodh Singh.translation: And with penance and asceticism he seeks Your comfort.

lines.gurmukhi: gurdws grIb; qumn kw cylw [

Dr. Jodh Singh.translation: Bless him, forgive his errors and omissions,

lines.gurmukhi: jip jip qum kau; BieE suhylw [

Dr. Jodh Singh.translation: By accepting slave Gurdas, as Your own.

lines.gurmukhi: ieh BUl cUk sB; bKs krIjY [
gurdws; gulwm Apnw kir lIjY [
ieauN kir hY; gurdws pukwrw [

Dr. Jodh Singh.translation: And thus exclaimed Gurdas;

lines.gurmukhi: hy siqguru muih lyhu aubwrw [26[

Dr. Jodh Singh.translation: O my True Guru, you grant me redemption.

lines.gurmukhi: ieh kvn kIt; gurdws ibcwrw [

Dr. Jodh Singh.translation: Who is this Gurdas, The poor creature?

lines.gurmukhi: jo Agm ingm kI; lKY sumwrw [

Dr. Jodh Singh.translation: He narrates about the inaccessible body-corporate.

lines.gurmukhi: jb kir ikrpw; gur bUJ buJweI [

Dr. Jodh Singh.translation: When he is bestowed with the understanding by the Guru,

lines.gurmukhi: qb ieh kQw; aucwir sunweI [

Dr. Jodh Singh.translation: He expounds this anecdote.

lines.gurmukhi: ijh ibn hukm; iek JulY n pwqw [

Dr. Jodh Singh.translation: Without His command, blows not a leaf,

lines.gurmukhi: Puin hoie soeI; jo krY ibDwqw [

Dr. Jodh Singh.translation: And happens whatever the Contriver wills.

lines.gurmukhi: hukmY AMdir; sgl Akwry [

Dr. Jodh Singh.translation: At His Command is the entire universe.

lines.gurmukhi: buJY hukm; su auqrY pwry [

Dr. Jodh Singh.translation: The ones who comprehend the order, swim across.

lines.gurmukhi: hukmY AMdir; bRhm mhysw [

Dr. Jodh Singh.translation: Under the Command exist all the gods, humans and animals.

lines.gurmukhi: hukmY AMdir; sur nr sysw [

Dr. Jodh Singh.translation: In the Command abide (the deities), Brahma and Mahesh.

lines.gurmukhi: hukmY AMdir; ibsnu bnwXM [

Dr. Jodh Singh.translation: And Command creates the Vishnu.

lines.gurmukhi: ijn hukm pwie; dIvwn lgwXM [

Dr. Jodh Singh.translation: Under Command temporal courts are held.

lines.gurmukhi: hukmY AMdir; Drm rcwXM [

Dr. Jodh Singh.translation: The Command advances the religious consciousness.

lines.gurmukhi: hukmY AMdir; ieMdr aupwXM [

Dr. Jodh Singh.translation: With the Command, Indra, the king of gods, is enthroned.

lines.gurmukhi: hukmY AMdir; sis Aru sUry [

Dr. Jodh Singh.translation: The sun and moon survive with His Command.

lines.gurmukhi: sB hir crx kI; bWCih DUry [

Dr. Jodh Singh.translation: And aspire for the blessings of Har's feet.

lines.gurmukhi: hukmY AMdir; Drin Akwsw [

Dr. Jodh Singh.translation: In the Command continue the earth and the skies.

lines.gurmukhi: hukmY AMdir; swis igrwsw [

Dr. Jodh Singh.translation: Birth and death come not without His Command.

lines.gurmukhi: ijh ibnw hukm; koeI mrY n jIvY [

Dr. Jodh Singh.translation: One who understands the Command achieves eternity.

lines.gurmukhi: bUJY hukm; so inhcl QIvY [
ieauN kir hY; gurdws pukwrw [

Dr. Jodh Singh.translation: And thus exclaimed Gurdas;

lines.gurmukhi: hy siqguru muih lyhu aubwrw [27[

Dr. Jodh Singh.translation: O my True Guru, you grant me redemption.

lines.gurmukhi: ieh vwr BgauqI mhW punIqy [

Dr. Jodh Singh.translation: This Epic of Bhagauti is prominently sacred,

lines.gurmukhi: ijs aucriq; aupjiq prqIqy [

Dr. Jodh Singh.translation: Sermonising which, (sublime) perception is revealed.

lines.gurmukhi: jo ies vwr soN; pRym lgwvY [

Dr. Jodh Singh.translation: Those, who will embrace this Epic,

lines.gurmukhi: soeI; mn bWiCq Pl pwvY [

Dr. Jodh Singh.translation: Will get their mental desires fulfilled.

lines.gurmukhi: imtihˆ sgl; duK duMd klysw [

Dr. Jodh Singh.translation: All the adversities, conflicts and bickering will be erased.

lines.gurmukhi: Pun pRgtYN; bhu suK prvysw [

Dr. Jodh Singh.translation: The sacred manifestation descends, and one gets contentment.

lines.gurmukhi: jo ins bwsur; rtihˆ ieh vwry [

Dr. Jodh Singh.translation: One who recites this Epic day and night,

lines.gurmukhi: so phuMcY; Dur hir drbwry [

Dr. Jodh Singh.translation: Will realise the internal court of Har.

lines.gurmukhi: ieh vwr BgauqI; smwpiq kInI [

Dr. Jodh Singh.translation: Thus the Epic of Bhagauti is completed.

lines.gurmukhi: qb Gt ibidAw kI; sB ibiD cInI [

Dr. Jodh Singh.translation: Through its knowledge the creator is recognised,

lines.gurmukhi: ieau siqguru swihb; Bey dieAwlw [

Dr. Jodh Singh.translation: Only then the True Guru becomes benevolent,

lines.gurmukhi: qb CUt gey; sB hI jMjwlw [

Dr. Jodh Singh.translation: And all the perplexities are ridden.

lines.gurmukhi: kir ikrpw; pRB hir igrDwry [

Dr. Jodh Singh.translation: O God, Almighty, do me a favour,

lines.gurmukhi: qih pkiV bWh; Baujl soN qwry [

Dr. Jodh Singh.translation: Hold my arm and enable me to swim across the temporal sea.

lines.gurmukhi: ieauN kir hY; gurdws pukwrw [

Dr. Jodh Singh.translation: Thus exclaimed Gurdas;

lines.gurmukhi: hy siqguru muih lyhu aubwrw [28[41[

Dr. Jodh Singh.translation: O my True Guru, you grant me redemption.
